text: Opel Agila was a car from the Japanese carmaker Suzuki with partnership from the German carmaker Opel from 2000 to 2015. == Suzuki Wagon R+ and Splash == The Suzuki Wagon R+ and Chevrolet MW are badge engineered versions of the Agila. It was replaced by the Splash in 2008 in Europe, however it is still available in countries such as Japan. Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles Agila
title: Opel Agila
